definition.name: Metrics embed
definition.description: An infographics generator with 40+ plugins and 300+ options to display stats about your GitHub account!
definition.author: lowlighter

inputs.name: base_hireable
inputs.description: Show `Available for hire!` in header section

inputs.name: commits_authoring
inputs.description: Identifiers that has been used for authoring commits

inputs.name: committer_token
inputs.description: GitHub Token used to commit metrics

inputs.name: retries
inputs.description: Retries in case of failures (for rendering)

inputs.name: retries_delay
inputs.description: Delay between each retry (in seconds, for rendering)

inputs.name: retries_output_action
inputs.description: Retries in case of failures (for output action)

inputs.name: retries_delay_output_action
inputs.description: Delay between each retry (in seconds, for output action)

inputs.name: quota_required_rest
inputs.description: Minimum GitHub REST API requests quota required to run

inputs.name: quota_required_graphql
inputs.description: Minimum GitHub GraphQL API requests quota required to run

inputs.name: quota_required_search
inputs.description: Minimum GitHub Search API requests quota required to run

inputs.name: notice_releases
inputs.description: Notice about new releases of metrics

inputs.name: use_prebuilt_image
inputs.description: Use pre-built docker image from [GitHub container registry](https://github.com/lowlighter/metrics/pkgs/container/metrics)

inputs.name: use_mocked_data
inputs.description: Use mocked data instead of live APIs

inputs.name: plugin_languages_other
inputs.description: Group unknown, ignored and over-limit languages into "Other" category

inputs.name: plugin_languages_recent_load
inputs.description: Indepth mode - Events to load (recently-used section)

inputs.name: plugin_languages_recent_days
inputs.description: Indepth mode - Events maximum age (day, recently-used section)

inputs.name: plugin_lines_delay
inputs.description: Delay before performing a second query

inputs.name: plugin_licenses_legal
inputs.description: Permissions, limitations and conditions about used licenses

inputs.name: plugin_reactions_limit
inputs.description: Display limit (issues and pull requests comments)

inputs.name: plugin_reactions_limit_issues
inputs.description: Display limit (issues and pull requests, first comment)

inputs.name: plugin_starlists_languages_aliases
inputs.description: Custom languages names in star lists

inputs.name: plugin_stackoverflow_lines
inputs.description: Display limit (lines per questions and answers)

inputs.name: plugin_crypto_vs_currency
inputs.description: The target currency of market data (usd, eur, jpy, etc.)

inputs.name: plugin_crypto_days
inputs.description: Data up to number of days ago (eg. 1,14,30,max)

inputs.name: plugin_crypto_precision
inputs.description: The number of decimal places to use

inputs.name: plugin_nightscout_datapoints
inputs.description: Number of datapoints shown the graph

inputs.name: plugin_nightscout_urgentlowalert
inputs.description: Threshold for urgently low blood sugar

inputs.name: plugin_nightscout_urgenthighalert
inputs.description: Threshold for urgently high blood sugar
